subject: Hockey, Ice
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: Dynamo Moscow’s Alexander Ovechkin of the Capitals and Lev Praha’s Zdeno Chara of the Bruins have resumed their friendly competition in the K.H.L.
snippet: Dynamo Moscow’s Alexander Ovechkin of the Capitals and Lev Praha’s Zdeno Chara of the Bruins have resumed their friendly competition in the K.H.L.
